item.title: Translating psycopg3 documentation
item.author: shuuji3@gmail.com (TAKAHASHI Shuuji)
item.description:
This post was actually written on March 25, 2023, but completely forgot to publish. During that period, I wrote TakahÄ“ articles and translated psycopg3 documentation into Japanese at the same time.

I continue translating psycopg3 into Japanese one by one. It’s fun to learn unknown PostgreSQL features and how psycopg3 is handling connections and queries under the hood for database libraries in Python!
